rooms.description: Modern reception area with minimalist design and ample natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows. Features a Vastu-aligned entrance.

Fully equipped gym area designed for luxury fitness. Incorporates natural light and ventilation through strategically placed windows.
Modern bathroom with contemporary fixtures. Utility area integrated for convenience, ensuring proper ventilation and Vastu compliance.
